nodes.bodyText:
I thought to make it simple
cd $1
find . -delete
cd ..
rmdir "$1"

Complicated logic in shell is very fragile and hard to support.

nodes.bodyText:
I agree; however, some of the no-error-test projects are a few subdirectories deep like 
  
    
      checkstyle/.ci/wercker.sh
    
    
         Line 156
      in
      341ef2d
    
    
    
    

        
          
           no-error-sevntu-checks) 
        
    
  

 and 
  
    
      checkstyle/.ci/wercker.sh
    
    
         Line 169
      in
      341ef2d
    
    
    
    

        
          
           no-error-contribution) 
        
    
  

.  I felt the recursive check for correct directory would be necessary for those like this.
Edit: Maybe just to get this PR finished, we do the simple one though?
